entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming west 20 early this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 25. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 22 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 22 by morning. Wind chill minus 39 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023
